a.title: Go to Louise Independent School District

div.div:
Our Mission: Our students shall be academically prepared to fulfill their potential, self-assured, and motivated to excel.
Our Vision: Educate the Whole Child

408 2nd Street PO BOX 97, Louise, TX 77455
Phone 979-648-2982 | Fax 979-648-2520

span.strong:
Important Information:
*** GRADUATION PLAN OPTIONS - Letter From Dr. Oliver, Please Read ***
**

a.title: Per Governor Abbott’s April 17, 2020, order, School classrooms are closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

span.strong: Per Governor Abbott’s April 17, 2020, order, School classrooms are closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

a.title: Per Governor Abbott’s April 17, 2020, order, School classrooms are closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

br.br:
** 2020/2021 High School Registration JH Registration Deadline May 1st
** Students may drop off school library books at the Louise Town library drop box. **
** Elementary, - On April 13th the Elementary campus handed out three weeks’ worth of assignments, and will be due by May 4th. Parents can drop off completed assignments on May 4th @ the Mill in Louise, 7AM to 9AM, or if possible submit completed assignments to teachers through google classroom or email. Contact your teacher or principal if you have questions.
** Junior High School - Instructional materials are posted or shared online through Google Classroom. Contact your teacher if you have questions.
** High School - Instructional materials are posted or shared online.

span.br:
** To Go Breakfast & Lunch, 6:45 to 9AM, weekdays, for all kids up to 18,
Drive up to the School Cafeteria Entrance, Kids must be with you.
* COVID-19 In Texas (Dashboard)
* Important information from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
* UIL Cancels All Remaining Spring Activities and State Championships
*

a.title: TEMPORARILY CLOSED, PLEASE CONTACT THE MAIN CLINIC IN EL CAMPO @ (979) 543-6251 ext. 461

Our Vision: Educate the Whole Child.
Send an email to District Tech Support / Webmaster

a.title: Click to Enter LISD Virtual Book Fari, Even though our school is not open, we want the Book Fair to be available for our students, parents and even grandparents to get great books! We invite you to shop our Book Fair online from April 22 - May 5! Take advantage of free shipping to your home on book-only orders over $25. Plus, all purchases benefit our school. Click the SHOP NOW button to start shopping and show your support. Your orders will not be delivered to the school. They come straight to you!

img.alt: CLICK HERE TO SHOP OUR VIRTUAL BOOK FAIR, @ The Scholastic Store and earn rewards for your school with every purchase when you click 'Shop Now' from this page! Explore thousands of best-selling books, collections, new releases, educational toys, games, and more. All online items priced as marked.
img.title: CLICK HERE TO SHOP OUR VIRTUAL BOOK FAIR, @ The Scholastic Store and earn rewards for your school with every purchase when you click 'Shop Now' from this page! Explore thousands of best-selling books, collections, new releases, educational toys, games, and more. All online items priced as marked.

a.title: By registering for e~Funds for Schools, parents are able to pay online for student meals! You will also have access to your full payment history. Make payments for multiple students in one easy transaction!

img.alt: Click here for more details - LISD now offers online payments for students cafeteria meals!
